title: Classic caramel squares
ingredients: ['For the caramel', '225g double cream', '25g brown sugar', 'For the shortbread', '110g Dairygold Baking Block, at room temperature', '55g caster sugar', '110g plain flour', '55g rice flour or cornflour', 'For the chocolate topping', '50g Dairygold Baking Block', '150g quality chocolate']
